Package it.polimi.ingsw.Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
EndGameEventBroadcaster, PlayerChoseGodEventBroadcaster, PlayerLoseEventBroadcaster, PlayerTurnUpdateBroadcaster
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerTurnUpdateBroadcaster, PlayerLoseEventBroadcaster, EndGameEventBroadcaster, PlayerChoseGodEventBroadcaster

      public Game​(java.util.List<Player> players, GameRules rules)
      Create a game object
      Parameters:
      players - the players taking part of this game
      rules - the rules to follow

    • SetGodPool

      public void SetGodPool​(Player player, java.util.List<java.lang.String> godPool) throws InvalidCommandException
      Handle a set god-pool command
      Parameters:
      player - the player performing this action
      godPool - the chosen god-pool
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if it's not this player's turn, if the player is not the challenger, if the god-pool has not been chosen yet, if the god-pool contains unknown god names, if the game proceeded past the god selection phase,

    • SetGod

      public void SetGod​(Player player, java.lang.String god) throws InvalidCommandException
      Handle a set god command
      Parameters:
      player - the player performing this action
      god - the chosen god
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if it's not this player's turn, if the player already chose a god, if the god name is unknown, if the game proceeded past the god selection phase

    • PlaceWorker

      public void PlaceWorker​(Player player, int x, int y) throws InvalidCommandException
      Handle a place worker command
      Parameters:
      player - the player performing this action
      x - the x-axis coordinate on the board the worker will be placed at
      y - the y-axis coordinate on the board the worker will be placed at
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if it's not this player's turn, if the player has already placed down all its workers (depends on game rules), if x or y are invalid, if the tile at (x, y) is already occupied, if the game hasn't started playing (StartPlaying())

    • Move

      public void Move​(Player player, int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY) throws InvalidCommandException, InvalidMoveActionException
      Handle a move command
      Parameters:
      player - the player that invokes this call
      fromX - the starting X coordinate on the board
      fromY - the starting Y coordinate on the board
      toX - the destination X coordinate on the board
      toY - the destination Y coordinate on the board
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if it's not this player's turn, if the starting or destination positions are invalid, if the game hasn't entered the playing phase (StartPlaying())
      InvalidMoveActionException - if the move is invalid based on the player's god modifiers

    • Build

      public void Build​(Player player, int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY, int lvl) throws InvalidCommandException, InvalidBuildActionException
      Handle a build command
      Parameters:
      player - the player that invokes this call
      fromX - the starting X coordinate on the board
      fromY - the starting Y coordinate on the board
      toX - the destination X coordinate on the board
      toY - the destination Y coordinate on the board
      lvl - the block to build, usually should be either corresponding to the current height or a dome
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if it's not this player's turn, if the starting or destination positions are invalid, if the game hasn't entered the playing phase (StartPlaying())
      InvalidBuildActionException - if the build is invalid based on the player's god modifiers

    • EndTurn

      public Player EndTurn​(Player player, boolean lose) throws InvalidCommandException
      End the current turn
      Parameters:
      player - the player that invokes this call
      lose - if the player has lost and we're skipping to the next one
      Returns:
      the next player to play
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if it's not this player's turn, if the player must complete other actions before ending the turn

    • computeAvailableActions

      public Pair<java.util.List<MoveCommandMessage>,​java.util.List<BuildCommandMessage>> computeAvailableActions​(Player p)
      Parameters:
      p - the player
      Returns:
      a pair containing two lists representing the available move actions and build actions for the player

    • getWorkersOf

      public java.util.List<Worker> getWorkersOf​(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      Returns:
      a list of the player's workers on the board
